description: The text label associated with the number field.
The placeholder text displayed inside the number field when it is empty.
Additional text that provides guidance or information about the number field.
If is cheked, the number field must be filled out before submitting the form.
Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the number field.
Specifies the minimum number of characters required in the number field.
Specifies the maximum numeric value allowed in the number field.
Specifies the minimum numeric value required in the number field.
Specifies the number of decimal places allowed after the decimal point.
Specifies the currency code to be used when the input type is set to 'Currency'.
Specifies the locale to be used for formatting the currency when the input type is set to 'Currency'.
